title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, the response is an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, the response is an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, the expected behavior is to receive an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
4. Observe that the response is an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
